Log into your account and check the balance section.
Visit your nearest ATM or branch to withdraw money.
You can open an account online through our website or visit a branch.
The minimum balance depends on your account type, check our website for details.
Go to profile settings and choose 'Update Mobile Number'.
Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen to reset it.
Login and go to 'Statements' to download your account activity.
Visit your branch or update it in your online profile settings.
Call customer care or use the app to block your debit card immediately.
You can call 1234567890 or email abc@urbank.com.
